Introduction to magrene

Source: vignettes/magrene.Rmd
magrene.Rmd

Install magrene

R is an open-source statistical environment which can be easily modified to enhance its functionality via packages. magrene is a R package available via the Bioconductor repository for packages. R can be installed on any operating system from CRAN after which you can install magrene by using the following commands in your R session:

if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) {
      install.packages("BiocManager")
  }

BiocManager::install("magrene")

## Check that you have a valid Bioconductor installation
BiocManager::valid()
